com.epoch.db
Class QuestionStore

java.lang.Object
  com.epoch.db.DBTables
      com.epoch.db.QuestionStore
All Implemented Interfaces:
StaticLimits, QuestionConstants, XMLConstants
public final class QuestionStore
extends DBTables
implements QuestionConstants

Contains all database operations pertaining to reading questions. All methods static. (Too large to instantiate.) (SYNC problems?)

getQuestions

public static List<Question> getQuestions(int qSetId,
                                          String instructorId)
                                   throws DBException
Gets the locally or master-authored questions in a question set sorted by master/local first, serial number second, and qId third. Locally authored Qs have negative qId, so they need to be sorted greater to lesser. Called by QSet and above.

Parameters:
qSetId - unique ID of the question set
instructorId - instructor's login (UK) or SMS (Pearson) ID
Returns:
questions sorted by unique ID
Throws:
DBException

getSingletonData

private static List<Question> getSingletonData(Connection con,
                                               String qIdSelector,
                                               String orderBy,
                                               DBTables table,
                                               boolean fullLoad,
                                               Map<Integer,String> headers,
                                               String[] userLangs)
                                        throws DBException
Utility method to retrieve a question's singleton data such as statement, flags, etc.

Parameters:
con - connection to database
qIdSelector - unique IDs of questions whose question data are desired, appended with instructor's userId if they are local
orderBy - how to order the questions
table - table for master- or locally authored questions
fullLoad - whether molecules associated with question data should be loaded
headers - text to append to question statements
userLangs - languages of this user in order of preference; null if English only
Returns:
true if at least one Q was retrieved successfully
Throws:
DBException

skipToNextQ

private static void skipToNextQ(DBTables table,
                                ResultSet rs,
                                int qId)
                         throws SQLException
Moves the pointer in a list of evaluators ahead to the first evaluator of the next question, if it's not there already.

Parameters:
table - table for master- or locally authored questions
rs - evaluators obtained from database
qId - current question ID
Throws:
SQLException

getEvaluator

static Evaluator getEvaluator(ResultSet rs)
                       throws SQLException
Form an evaluator from the current result set, with given qId and majorId. In case of light load of Q (display only), molecules is null. Browses through the set with fixed qId, majorId and all minorIds.

qId, majorId, minorId:
10, 1, 0
10, 2, 0
10, 2, 1
10, 2, 2

Conditions: res must contain at least one element
res must be sorted by qId, majorId, minorId

An arbitrary tree expression is stored as follows. The root is stored as minorId = 0 and matchCode = null. Each node is given a minorId in the order of infix traversal, Then at root, postfix expr of entire tree is stored. Complex intermediate nodes are not written.

Parameters:
rs - evaluator data retrieved from database
Returns:
a complete evaluator, simple or complex
Throws:
SQLException

                               String qIdSelector,
                               DBTables table,

Parameters:
qId - unique ID of the question
authorId - question author's login (UK) or SMS (Pearson) ID
Returns:
the question flags, or 0 if not found

getAllQuestionIds

public static String getAllQuestionIds(int qSetId)
Gets all ID numbers of master-authored questions in a question set.

Parameters:
qSetId - ID number of the question set
Returns:
colon-separated string of ID numbers of all master-authored questions in the question set; null if query fails

getOrderSql

private static String getOrderSql(boolean byRemarks)
Gets an SQL fragment describing how to order retrieved questions.

Parameters:
byRemarks - whether to order by remarks
Returns:
String containing the SQL fragment

getQMapByQId

private static Map<Integer,Question> getQMapByQId(List<Question> qList)
Gets a map of questions hashed by qId from a list of questions.

Parameters:
qList - a list of questions
Returns:
map of questions hashed by qId

appendHeader

static String appendHeader(String header,
                           String qStmt)
Appends the common question statement to a question statement. Called by getSingletonData() and TranslationReadWrite.modifyItem().

Parameters:
header - common question statement
qStmt - one question's question statement
Returns:
modified question statement
